definition: to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose

sentences.english: In the mean time the foreshadowed political storm was brewing .
sentences.chinese: 正在這時候，預卜的政治風暴正在醞釀着。

sentences.english: The outcome of the war is hard to foretell.
Witches were believed to be able to see into the future.
sentences.chinese: 女巫也有預卜未來的本領。

sentences.english: The future is hidden from us .
sentences.chinese: 未來是我們難以預卜的。
